Seriously? The people who say she should go back to country are so wrong

Yep Taylor is changing. It's been a long many years of being rich and famous

It's good but... I like most of the songs but this album could defiantly use some

Any one who says that her country music is better well that's your opinion so

Couldn't be any better! This album is by far the BEST! I love her music because I can relate to

Wow AWESOME!!!!! Don't listen to them you're awesome, I'm one of your fan,,

All Taylor swift songs!!! This album is good but....WHY DID SHE CHANGE FROM COUNTRY TO POP..!!!Her

AMAZING! Taylor just keeps getting better and better...and what I love the most is

Wildest dreams Beautiful, & I've dedicated this song to a very special someone whom I 
miss terribly! Love to Eu

Worst song known to man If u like this song u have no life and no taste in music. The world would 
be a much better place without it. Gayest, crapiest, most horrible song 
ever.

Hmmm I just don't get it....I feel like I'm 9 again listening to oops I did it 
again...yuck...don't get me wrong there are a few good songs but yea her 
country was so much better...don't no wat happened to ya Taylor not so 
swift little disappointed

I actually love it! I find it soooo ironic that many TS fans are saying they hate or dont like 
this new album for sounding like trash, etc. Thats because I have NEVER 
been a Taylor Swift fan, never could get into her music, yet I actually 
really like this. I'm not even heavy into pop either. The only songs I'd 
take off this album if I could are Welcome to New York, All You Had to Do 
Was Stay, Bad Blood, and I Know Places. Otherwise is great! Fave songs here 
are Clean, I Wish You Would, Style, This Love and Wildest Dreams.
Sorry to say I've never payed for music before this! I can't get this song out of my head :)

Sorry Taylor but I'm disappointed. I really like some of these songs but she lost too much of why I came to 
like her music. She was always very original and had catchy lyrics and 
sounds. Red was her best album to date. I liked where that was going but 
then she jumped off the bridge with this album. Now she sounds like 
everything else. Boring and unoriginal.

Its sad.... Everyone on here is saying how country taylor used to be. Get a 
clue.....country isnt country anymore. The 90's were the last decade of 
true country. The music we call country today is just as much pop as 
taylor's new album. GET OVER IT. Kudos to taylor !!! Great album.

Love it! Who cares what the haters say. Everyone is allowed to change even 
TSwift!! Love her new album... Style, I Know Places, Wildest Dreams, Clean, 
& Blank Space are my absolute favourite songs♡☆♡☆

Seriously I am a 100% swiftie and I just want to say that those people who are 
saying that Taylor needs to switch back to country is wrong and those 
people that are saying she needs to stay with pop is wrong too because 
Taylor is Taylor she can stick with pop or she can stay with country she 
can even do both its her decision she can pick which ever she wants so 
instead of saying she needs to do this you should be supportive of what she 
chooses Taylor can be the queen of country pop AND I'M TALKING TO ALL YOU 
SWIFTIES

Finally taking to her ACTUAL sound! Taylor Swift has never been country and never will be. Her sound has 
always been pop and I'm so happy she finally took to her pop roots. all 
those past country songs or as pop as they get. I don't know how you guys 
listen to country, but in the south we listen to Tim McGraw, Blake Shelton, 
George Strait, Johnny Cash, Miranda Lambert, Shania Twain etc. while I'm at 
it Luke Bryan, Jason Aldean, and all those new fake country artists need to 
stop making country into some kind of drunken scene for teens.

Great album I don't know what i expected from Taylor Swift and her crossover album but 
it is a fantastic album however, I find really unfortunate that her bonus 
songs aren't available with this album purchase or as individual songs.

Her music isnt the same anymore. Very bad tracks, no more good lyrics and her panting when singing she had 
no good voice, better listen to Shania twain.

Love it I love this album,i lov taylor,if u guys have notting nice to say then 
dont say anything➕ur awsome taylor dont have to listen to the haters they 
just hate, ur the best taylor

Good songs Love Style,Shake It Off,Blank Space;Wildest Dreams n Bad Blood luv ya

Totes awesomsause! I mean who dosent like Taylor Swift?? Who thinks that is the lamest person

Just amazing!! OMG I LISTENED TO DIS ALBUM EVERYDAY WHENEVER I CAN ITS THE WORLD TO ME

Speechless. Every time. There have been few artists capable of making the transition between 
genres like Swift. That said, she herself raised the bar on her music, 
something she does exceptionally well. There is no doubt that her music 
continues to excel exponentially. Taylor Swift knows no boundaries, nor 
limits.

Best yet!!! I love that she's breaking out of her shell. T swift is growing up but not 
straying away from HER sound!

Ed Sheeran is just the most amazing artist ever. I clicked on "one" and 
within the first three words I had chills. Love him♥

ED SHEERAN IS AMAZING Wow. his upbeat songs make me wanna jump and his slow songs make me wanna 
find someone close. His song Thinking Out Loud is my new favorite song.

NO NEED TO LISTEN IT'S ALREADY A 5★ Every time he drops an album I always end up in a relationship and I hate 
how he almost does he music with me specifically in mind. He just knows me 
so well smh love Ed Sheeran. The man is a genius

Amazing One of my favourite albums. I bought + and thought it was great. But then 
I got x and loved it. Always been a great fan of Ed Sheeran and can't wait 
to see him in October.

Impressive 2nd assault Was a little suspicious that the influences of pharell and the other dude 
who's name I forget would sully the strong songwriting of ed . But not a

X Absolute genius his lyrics create love and loving relationships you knock 
em out ed I will knock em up lol

Ed Sheeran, you've done it again! I have listened to this album over and over again since september and I 
can't stop listening! A lot of people are saying its the same thing over 
and over again, meeting a girl, describing what you did together, that is 
all they think it is, but its not, is a fantastic album with an amazing 
collection of songs, that I can't stop listening to! I have proved that its 
not just teenage girls who love this album, its also teenage boys.

I'm in love I love ed he is such a genius! Every verse and every song just gets better

Blew it again Once again another album with a couple of good tracks and a lot of rubbish

"He knows me so well" really? You're a teenage girl, the only people that

rest, like his first album, utter drivel!!

Just Happy.... He puts a smile on my face, makes my ears so happy to be listening. And 
his words fill my heart. Lyrics that touch me deep. What's better than 
that?

Simply best... Ed can absolutely sing... sing the best Absolutely best voice and singer out there. Plus one great songwriter ;)

Amazing love love love this! Ed Sheeran will always be my all time favorite

Love it! Was skeptical if I would like his other music than what plays on the

Absolutely perfect! I love ed sheeran and his music. My sister's first 
dance song is thinking out loud and i always cry when i listen to it

just okay THINKING OUT LOUD was the hit. So annoying and overplayed, but thats not 
his fault. Sing and don't were a pretty great. All the rest sounded from

Thinking out loud Awesome,akickass hit. Its perfect for any setting. I feel him. My heart

Ed sheeran is.the GREATEST I have not heard a song by him I dont like honestly, ive learned many of 
his songs on guitar and play them them for my friends around the fire, 
arkansas for ya

True Musical and Lyrical Genius Ed's music never fails to leave me speechless and this album is no 
exception. He is different than everyone else in the music industry, he 
truly loves what he does and his lyrics show that and he has a way of 
making you feel emotions you didn't even know could be felt. He doesn't do 
it for fame, he simply does it because he loves it and he likes to make 
people happy. SO much respect to this man. He is a true legend. I will 
forever support him in everything that he does. Infinite stars for Ed 
Sheeran.

Ed Freaking Sheeran I haven't even listened to this whole album yet and I know it's a 5 star 
album (;

Seriously? After being completely in love with his first album I really wanted this 
to be good. This is a completely honest review.. Belive me. Well let's look 
at the positives first... Sing was a good song and you've probably got 
bored to death of it by now. Right on to the negatives every song is about 
the same thing... He meets a girl and he describes the things they did 
together.. every.. single.. song... Oh you want more? Well tough he ran out 
of ideas after he made his first album. So yeah that was a £5 wasted. The 
only people who are going to enjoy this are teenage girls that are so in 
love with Ed Sheeran that no matter what he says or does he will always be 
'perfect'.

I'm in love He's one of best artists of our time and he's just incredible. His last 
album was boss as well. The fact that he can write, sing, rap, beat box and 
play the quitar at the same time is just incredibly impressive. His lyrics 
are so deep and hits you in the heart. Ed is so down to earth and a great 
person and I love him. Great job ed.

Love him He has lots of amazing songs but number 11 (thinking out loud) is the best 
it makes me want to cry

What an album! I'd hate to know how many times I've listened to this album. Fantastic! 
There is a wonderful variety of songs from powerful ballades, romantic love 
song and move melodic rap with a heavy hiphop influence. There truly is a 
sobg for every occasion on this album. Lyrically this album is the best 
I've ever heard. Ed sings about the struggles of life on tour, the pain of 
loosing a family member, and all while falling in and out of love. I have 
also head this album played love and it too surpassed my expectations

What real music is. If you want to listen to something with depth and meaning, this is the 
album for you. If your tired of this lame rap music we have today that 
literally Is *beep* that *beep* I got all this money *n*gga* blah blah then 
THIS IS DEF the album for you! Ed is literally beyond talented and gives me 
hope that the music industry has not completely gone down the drain. I hope 
whoever listens to this album really does enjoy it, its so good!

Excellent Brilliant album. As with +, the released songs are the worst ones on it, 
not to say they're bad. It is a little bit samey as + but in the best way 
possible. Some lovely songs on there. Personal favourites being Thinking 
Out Loud, Tenerife Sea and Afire Love.

Speaks to my soul When I first heard thinkin out loud it was like I was listening to my own 
thoughts it was amazing and how they used an old famous bass line and 
transformed it into a great song blows my mind.

Love it !!! I ♥ Ed Sheeran sooo much, listen to this album coz YOLO ( u only liv once) 
my fav song is SING xxx

I very much enjoy Ed's music - it's a very interesting variety compared to 
many pop musicians on the radio today. "Thinking Out Loud" and "Afire Love" 
are two favorites - call me a sap, but the former is wonderful to dance to!

OMG I got + and I didn't think anything could be better. But x is just 
amazing! Afire love is by far my favourite song ever and I love the album 
sooooooooooooooo much! Keep making amazing songs edd;)

Love His Music He has an amazing voice I love him besides the fact that he is totally 
cute I especially love thinking out loud

I love the cd, and tried to play it this morning and it sounds absolutely 
awful. I am so disappointed that I spent money on it. It sounds muffled and 
scratchy. I regret buying it from Google play. Terrible purchase.

Yeah... And? So I like Ed but there is nothing on this album that really stands out to 
me as genius or intelligent. Nothing new or boundary pushing. This is great 
music for ordering a pumpkin spice latte and Starbucks with your fellow 
hipster friends. It's a very uneventful 40 minutes if you ask me. Now Ed 
can sing and play for sure and he is incredibly successful which is great 
however, there is a difference between making successful music and making 
quality music. (This is my opinion)

OMG!! Sam has really killed it in every song that he has sang. He could sing the 
phone book and I would listen. Can't wait to hear his next album because I 
will be buying it!
